original_title: A Proposal for a PowerPoint Presentation on Philip Guston's painting Evidence
overview: This is a commissioned project for San Francisco MOMA's Open Space website. Herschend was asked to choose a work from their permanent collection and create a reaction. He chose to create a proposal for a potential PowerPoint on the Philip Guston's painting "Evidence."
title: A Proposal for a PowerPoint Presentation on Philip Guston's painting Evidence
